body.title: a)
body.body: Harvest bone marrow cells by flushing femur with ice-cold bone marrow harvesting medium.

body.title: b)
body.body: Filter the suspended cells through 70µm cell strainer while keeping cells on ice.

body.title: c)
body.body: Count the cell concentration.

body.title: d)
body.body: Centrifuge the filtered cells at 1500rpm for 5-10 min.

body.title: e)
body.body: Resuspend the cells with HBSS+ staining buffer \(HBSS+, ~2×10^7 cells/mL if possible).

body.title: a)
body.body: Aliquot 100µl suspended cells for staining. Prepare controls including unstained control, single color controls for FACS compensation.

body.title: b)
body.body: Prepare 2mM FDG working solution by diluting 20mM FDG stock solution with ice-cold distilled water. Prepare working FDG control solution by diluting FDG control stock solution by 1:10. Aliquote 100µL FDG working solution or control solution to amber tubes.

body.title: c)
body.body: Prepare 15mL tubes with 2mL HBSS+ buffer and keep on ice.

body.title: d)
body.body: Make sure all the sets of cell sample tubes, FDG tubes and 2mL HBSS+ tubes are ready for the following steps.

body.title: e)
body.body: Prewarm cell sample tubes and corresponding FDG \(or control) tubes in 37ºC water bath for 10min. 2mL HBSS+ tubes are kept on ice during loading.

body.title: f)
body.body: Follow the FDG loading strategy shown in Figure 1 to load FDG into cells. Transfer prewarmed cells into corresponding FDG tubes. Mix thoroughly. Return to 37ºC bath for exactly 1 min. Stop the FDG loading at the end of one min by transferring mixture into 2mL ice-cold HBSS+.

body.title: g)
body.body: Keep on ice for 1.5 hours to allow accumulation of FITC release from FDG in LacZ+ cells.

body.title: h)
body.body: Centrifuge at 1500rpm for 7 minutes, discard supernatant and resuspend cell pellets with 100µL ice-cold HBSS+ buffer.

body.title: a)
body.body: Add 2µl antibodies to cells and slowly rock at 4ºC for 15 min.

body.title: b)
body.body: Centrifuge at 1500rpm for 5-10 min, discard supernatants and resuspend cell pellets with 200ul ice-cold HBSS+.

body.title: c)
body.body: Add 7µl 7-AAD solution to 200µl cells

body.title: a)
body.body: Adjust voltage.

body.title: b)
body.body: Run compensation.

body.title: c)
body.body: Run samples and collect FACS data.

body.title: d)
body.body: Analyze your FACS data.
